attributes.action: allow the British public to be able to use the facilities within all MP's second homes as we pay for them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given the extortionate expenses towards second homes that all MPs are allowed to claim, I believe that the British Tax paying public should be able to use the facilities and amenities within each of these homes as we are paying for them.
Particularly those who are currently struggling to pay for, live in or even afford to buy ONE home due to the excessive amount of taxes we pay from our wages, which never seem to rise in line with inflation.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
